subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The 2007 N.F.L. schedule was released Wednesday, and it shows that in the first two weeks of the regular season the Patriots will play the two teams they beat in last season’s playoffs.
snippet: The 2007 N.F.L. schedule was released Wednesday, and it shows that in the first two weeks of the regular season the Patriots will play the two teams they beat in last season’s playoffs.
